lender.name: Taryn
lender.occupational_info: I work in the office at an elementary school in New York City.

lender.name: sarah
lender.loan_because: I loaned this money because it makes me feel good to help others.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life and would like to give back to others in need.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I believe that through Jesus God is currently restoring everyone and everything in the world. I am a Christian and as my family seeks to follow Jesus, we want to partner with God in this task. Providing a way out of poverty in a renewable and consistent way that honors the dignity of those in poverty is something that my family supports wholeheartedly.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Christian pastor in America seeking to live out a life of faith in Jesus and to lead others in the same way.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: it just plain makes me feel good being able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: My found stray who ended up at my door as a kitten / such great tiger kinda cat markings!!

lender.name: Luca
lender.loan_because: it's a way to make the world a bit better

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to feel helpless!
lender.occupational_info: I play music!

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: I'm interested in other cultures and helping people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in a school helping children to learn and get along with each other. Now I am retired.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I have traveled the world, and seen myself in people everywhere.
lender.occupational_info: I manage an organization that creates software applications for the telecommunications industry.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I believe in self initiation and giving more than taking
lender.occupational_info: I help make medicines and I raise my two beautiful daughters.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: To help improve the quality of living for people less fortunate then me one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: Chief Executive Officer for insurance company located in the USA.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to positively impact our world.
lender.occupational_info: I provide prenatal education to women when they first find out they are pregnant.

lender.name: Kellie
lender.loan_because: we should all try to do some good in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a secretary at a large church.

lender.name: Integra PIM
lender.loan_because: Integra has selected Kiva to facilitate our charitable contributions. As a firm, we see tremendous merit in the perpetual nature of the loans we make through Kiva. We beleive Kiva encourages progress, hard work and opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Integra is an investment management firm located in Toronto, Ontario Canada. We specialize in investment management services for Canadian individuals, foundations and endowments

lender.name: Roman
lender.loan_because: to whom much is given, much is expected

lender.name: Jose Francisco
lender.whereabouts: Duque de Caxias Rio de Janeiro
lender.loan_because:
We were the first to install video rental in the neighborhood of 16 years ago (1991) and would like to diversify the service in our shop.
The pirate CDs and DVDs are destroying the market for video. But we are trying to survive legally, working only with the original DVD.
So we need help in a campaign against piracy in our neighborhood.
If somebudy can help me. Thanks...
Jose Francisco Rio de Janeiro Brazil
lender.occupational_info: We work in the market for video rentals. Our shop (VOYAGER VIDEO) is in a poor community, in the city of Duque de Caxias in Rio de Janeiro / Brazil

lender.name: Judson
lender.loan_because: My wife and I own our own retail business and I understand the power of having someone belive in your dream enough to give you a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Owner of retail clothing store.

lender.name: fyroze
lender.loan_because: to make a persons life a little bit different and feel very good about it !
lender.occupational_info: imports and exports of Fabric and clothing

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can help make the world a better place to live.... one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an Information Architect at CIDA

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: I truly enjoy making people smile.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a center that helps educate families from other countries.

lender.name: Christa
lender.loan_because: I want to wipe out poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am the clerk (secretary) for a judge at the county court in my city. I keep minutes for the trials we hear, organize papers and exhibits for the judge, and help the judge to write up his orders and rulings.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: It is literally amazing when people come together to make such a positive change all around the world. This is proof of what a small amount of effort can do!!!! I am very blessed, and I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Project Manager

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am able.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a very creative environment, an advertising agency. Our team is focused on driving business results through unique effective advertising.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I think of ways to advertise Miller Beer and write the advertisements you see in bars and retailers across the United States

lender.name: Cristina
lender.loan_because: everybody needs a helping hand sometimes.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It's humbling to realize the impact that even a small loan can make in someone's life. I know how challenging it is to build a business. Kiva enables me to help others do that.
lender.occupational_info: We help socially conscious companies create brands that lead with their values. Our brand positioning, design, and marketing communication work connects brands to their audiences because of the emotional links their shared values provide.

lender.name: Gerben
lender.loan_because: I feel this is a way that works. Not supporting corrupt governments or organisations who's CEO's need to get paid too. I feel that by supporting an individual entrepeneur you'll support his surroundings... Thus supporting the community. Which in long term will be far more effective than money spent in the past.
lender.occupational_info: I am the last link in the chain of making films and commercials. I check everything from spelling to dust on the film. I make copies, i make dvd's. I also write scripts now and than. Also i'm in a band. See and listen below :)

lender.name: Irene Montes
lender.loan_because: Giving & Receiving is one of the Spiritual Laws of the Universe.
lender.occupational_info: IMMIGRATION REFORM IS HERE. I have over 11 yrs experience working for the Immigration Service. I desire to help people get their Immigration status. Go to: immigrationparati.com.

lender.name: Manuel
lender.loan_because:
This site is an easier way to help other people.
Lo hago porque es una forma muy facil de ayudar a quien lo necesita.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: i am blessed to have what i have, and if i can help others with their dreams, it makes my life worth while!
lender.occupational_info: My 1st and most meaningful job is being a mom. I am a single mom, who raises her daughter the best I can. i know how hard it is, and that is why i want to help others. I also work for a vet, taking care of peoples pets, making sure that they are healthy and cared for.

lender.name: Cole
lender.loan_because: it changes the world and i think that was the point of Jesus coming here
lender.occupational_info: I help kids to connect to God, I teach them to help others and change the world... to love more

lender.name: Olivia
lender.loan_because: A little girl who is six. You can see her at: www.kiva.org/lender/oliviahking
lender.occupational_info: I teach/taught English in China, Cambodia and Canada

lender.name: Machele
lender.loan_because: it's such a simple way to prove that each of us has the ability to positively impact another person in any part of the world.

lender.name: Whole Fam Damily Helps
lender.loan_because: I have loaned on behalf of my family to start giving as a family. I have loaned a portion of the money that I would normally put towards their gifts in the spirit of giving.

lender.name: Tanilee
lender.loan_because: I know /lived in the region and understand the impact it has.

lender.name: University of Washington
lender.occupation: We work together and chose to donate to kiva.

lender.name: TSC- Truscot
lender.loan_because: It is God calls me to do. Besides I have basically everything I need. Why not share?
lender.occupational_info: I work with science teachers so that they can improve their skills to help students.

lender.name: Luc
lender.loan_because: I am going to Vietnam in 2008 as part of a high-school trip, and apart from touring the country, I want to see a culture different from my own and by making a loan I can see where my contribution may assist others not quite as fortunate as me.
lender.occupational_info: I am in high-school in Auckland, New Zealand, and have a range of interests including science, technology, IT etc and various sports .. and I have no idea what I want to do after I leave school.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: It puts capital into the hands of people who can make good use of it, and will help me to develop a stronger sense of empathy.

lender.name: Krista
lender.loan_because: I can. And to show people through my actions that it doesn't take much to positively change someone's life.

lender.name: Marie-Helene
lender.loan_because: I would like all children to be fed, clothed and educated.

lender.name: Human Warmth
lender.loan_because: I am.
lender.occupational_info: I work each day to add value to the world in some capacity; and to support my family and through them, our community.

lender.name: William
lender.occupational_info: Construction Manager for New York based company. Currently assigned to constrcution of a 44 story commercial building in lower Manhattan.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because:
I believe one person can make a difference.
If you can't feed a hundred people, then feed just one. ~Mother Teresa
lender.occupational_info: Manage operations and staff in a medical office.

lender.name: rhea
lender.loan_because: i love to see others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: i work on web sites.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance. Very few people are accumulating the majority of the wealth in the world; redirecting this wealth- one loan at a time- is doing my part to counteract this phenomenon. It makes me feel good to know I'm doing my part to redistribute wealth to people who truly need it.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English in South Korea.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I've been given so many opportunities, and I want to give some to others.

lender.name: Jackets
lender.loan_because: I am lucky in what I have and I would like to share and encourage others to share as well! What a great way to help!
lender.occupational_info: I provide intellectual property (patent, trademark and copyright) protection for clients.

lender.name: Hilton Sisters
lender.loan_because: My sisters and I thought this would be a great way to celebrate the holidays.

lender.name: Skye Brannon
lender.loan_because: I was going to put this money into a collage savings account for my nephews, but decided to cycle it through Kiva first. I want to help make the planet a better place for them, and every one else!
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Maria José
lender.loan_because: it may make a difference

lender.name: eileen
lender.occupation: nurse working with preterm and sick babies

lender.name: Claudya
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have an opportunity to succeed and thrive.
lender.occupational_info: My passion is acting and I feel blessed whenever I get paid to perform. The rest of the time I do whatever it takes to pay the bills including working in a museum, being a personal assistant, and translation work.

lender.name: Megan Fitzgerald
lender.occupation: Expat Career and Personal Branding Coach
lender.loan_because: There are millions of entrepreneurs out there with fantastic vision, passion and purpose who just need a little support to help them build the business that is going to support their family and their community. Supporting economic growth around the world serves all of us - with just a small loan anyone can have incredible impact in someone else's life - and an impact on the world's economic development as a result.
lender.occupational_info:
I help expats committed to their own growth and success be more visible, sought after and land work abroad. Having built a portable career that supports my choice of global living, I use my 19+ years experience in professional and business development in 40+ countries and a creative, in depth and online-centered approach to help others do the same.
To learn more visit my website (below) or my blog: www.careerbychoiceblog.com.
Thanks for the visit. It's great to be a part of this community. If we all do our part I believe the world will be a better place because of it.

lender.name: Ryan&Crystal
lender.loan_because: first, out of God's love for us, we love Him back. Then out of that, flows a love and servanthood toward all of His people as Jesus demonstrated perfectly.
lender.occupational_info: Crystal is a pre-kindergarten teacher who works with 4 year olds. Ryan works in a Christ-centered church with children ages 10 to 18. He develops programs, organizes events, builds relationships, and teaches lessons in order to draw teenages closer to Jesus, His Salvation, and His message of community.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: God always takes care of my needs and I feel it is my turn now to help people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I used to be a computer professional and am retired now.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a break. I am particularly keen on helping women in the developing world because I am a great believer in the power of women to change the world. I lived in Asia for 12 years, and while I have seen some terrible poverty, I have also met some wonderful people who work really hard to make their lives and the lives of their communities better.
lender.occupational_info: I run an advertising agency with my husband. We advertise products and services for a number of local, national and international clients

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I HOPE TO HELP IMPROVE CONDITIONS AROUND THE WORLD
lender.occupational_info: RETIRED FROM FINANCIAL SERVICES NOW FINANCIAL LITERACY VOLUNTEER OF CENTRAL TEXAS

lender.name: Scotty
lender.loan_because:
If I can help people better themselves through their hard work, I am willing to help out.
As long as someone is willing to work to make a living, and if they are willing to take a risk by taking a loan, and if a small loan will help people to make their life better, then it is worth helping those people.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the government to help people in their time of need.

lender.name: Benjamin and Brandon
lender.loan_because: We want to help other people

lender.name: Bing & Jennie
lender.loan_because: Our middle school Sunday School class (6, 7 & 8 grades) at First Congregational Church of Palo Alto made this loan.
lender.occupational_info: Matching the right people and interests for a good outcome for both.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: this is an easy and effective way to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I write, analyze, and test computer software

lender.name: Shauna
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that the money I put into Kiva loans keeps working to help small businesses grow. As the loans are repaid I can to use that money to assist the next entrepreneur, and the next one, and the next one.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.occupational_info: I go to school. I will be working with animals as a Veterinarian Tech.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference.

lender.name: Gary N.
lender.loan_because: the more prosperity the more peace.
lender.occupational_info: I help people invest their money.

lender.name: Gene
lender.loan_because: I own a small business, and I want others to be able to enjoy the sense of living and working their own dream.
lender.occupational_info: We assist companies around the world to make business decisions on how to grow and protect their own businesses.

lender.name: jon
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it is start your own business and become independent
lender.occupational_info: I work in all aspects of theatre and try to help kids to develope their talents ,no matter what the talents are.

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful opportunity Kiva gives us to help those who are willing to learn and work hard to improve their lives and the lives of their children.
lender.occupational_info: I have raised, trained, and marketed exotic and endangered animals for decades. My five sons are all grown and I hope will follow me in the Kiva experience.

lender.name: Rusty Andrade
lender.loan_because: I have been given many gifts in life, the most valuable of which is the ability to earn my own way. It's important to me to continue to help others make the most of their circumstances.

lender.name: The Larson Family
lender.loan_because: We teach our kids to give to those less fortunate than us & that even the smallest amount given can made a huge difference.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: I've always wanted to help people get out of poverty, but I've never thought that just giving them money because they look like their in bad shape was a terribly wonderful idea.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find interesting things to read. I don't get paid because I'm not sixteen yet (the legal working age) but I get to see what working in a bookstore is like.

lender.name: T_F
lender.loan_because: I truly appreciate small business owners, worldwide. I don't own a small business myself, but I have great respect for those who do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a journalist.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves. Its more important to teach others how to fish than to give a fish, and since I can't teach how to fish, the least I can do is provide some assistance. :)

lender.name: nancy
lender.loan_because: I deeply admire people who are working to make their lives better one day at a time....
lender.occupational_info: I care for my family and my home; we try to make what we have stretch;we remake, reuse and recyle. But still, I have a lot to learn from people like Sapnah.

lender.name: Abrilla
lender.loan_because: It's an excellent way to help people help themselves. We all need someone to believe in us an extend resources when needed. The loan Program will build better lives for families, which builds a better world for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: As an insurance agent, I educate, assist, enroll and sell Life, Health, and Mortgage Insurance protections to the public at large.

lender.name: Juan (Tony)
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Treasury department of a 113 billion dollar company

lender.name: Vince
lender.loan_because: Why not.
lender.occupational_info: Real estate and construction

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I've seen the valuable impact that micro lending can have on an individual's life, the lives of their children, and the community they live in.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit incubator and consulting firm that helps nonprofits mobilize more resources toward achieving their mission every day.

lender.name: Jack & Sharon
lender.loan_because: We both desire to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I make paper, write, bind books, take photos and garden. My wife binds books, makes and designs jewlery, writes, paints, draws and much more.

lender.name: Zoe
lender.loan_because: People need to help each other. We take too much for granted.

lender.name: Carrol
lender.loan_because: I have traveled in a number of Third World Countries, especially in SE Asia and continually marvel at the hard working people. Being able to assist some of them financially with loans is a great privilege to me. In my mind, loans which acknowledge the value of work, are far superior to the handouts tourists are often tempted to give.

lender.name: symmetries
lender.loan_because: A few years ago, our daughter suggested we make a loan on behalf of her school teachers, instead of giving them Christmas gifts. Who knew then that that first loan would continue to be a gift that keeps on giving and giving!

lender.name: Libby
lender.occupational_info: Helping businesses think strategically about their market and how to execute to make money.

lender.name: Norah
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to be part of the global community to help people help themself.
lender.occupational_info: Help people with financial problems.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: For one year I'm not eating out for lunch once a week, and using that money to sponsor one $25 loan per month. Any repayments are being put back into new micro-loans.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: 4/5_Students_in_Alaska
lender.occupation: Fourth and Fifth Grade Students in Anchorage, AK
lender.loan_because: Because we want to change the world!
lender.occupational_info: We go to school every day and study reading, math, sicence, social studies...

lender.name: Daniela
lender.occupation: a lil bit of this and that
lender.loan_because: i believe that people when given opportunities can make something come out of themselves...be it creative, manual, useful, unuseful, pratical or silly...
lender.occupational_info: well...don't really know how to answer that! i've been picking strawberies in denmark, assisting kids in germany, teaching in lisbon/portugal, barmaiding in porto/portugal, producing stuff, and so on...you can say i'm handy!

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and should in some small way be a blessing to others.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: To laugh often and love much; to win the respect of intelligent persons and the affection of children; to earn the approbation of honest citizens and endure the betrayal of false friends; to appreciate beauty; to find the best in others; to give of one’s self; to leave the world a bit better, whether by a healthy child, a garden patch or a redeemed social condition; to have played and laughed with enthusiasm and sung with exultation; to know even one life has breathed easier because you have lived—this is to have succeeded

lender.name: Christy & Josh
lender.occupational_info: I love it!

lender.name: John & Djohariah
lender.loan_because: ...its the right thing to do.

lender.name: Hillary
lender.loan_because: I like to help people.

lender.name: Crystal
lender.loan_because: It's exciting to hopefully make a difference and help change some else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my kids, husband and home and I'm fortunate enough to be able to spend time volunteering and not working all the time.

lender.name: Michelle & James
lender.loan_because: we want to help make the world a better place, and we believe that microlending is one way of doing this.

lender.name: Candace
lender.loan_because: it's motivating to see businesses and people succeed and being the BEST they can be !
lender.occupational_info: I work in a dental office, cleaning teeth !

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: As a small business owner I understand the need for a little help sometimes. I feel its good to help others with a need
lender.occupational_info: I custom print T-Shirts and other garments.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I'm in a positions where I have the ability to give so I should.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student and for work I serve food in the cafeteria here at my university, not to glamorous, but it pays my bills

lender.name: Lorie
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be in a position to give someone a helping hand. I am delighted to have the opportunity to "pay it forward".

lender.name: Emmie
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world. Even though I am young, I believe I can do anything when I put my mind to it. I am so blessed in the shoes I am in so I want to help others as much as I possibly can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student that aspires to study journalism, spanish, and/or a social science like anthropology or sociology.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: it is such a small amount and it could potentially make a big difference to someone.
lender.occupational_info: Doing the best I can at whatever I am working on at the moment!!! The more I try to do my personal best the better life becomes...

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to help those who want to be successful in their lives and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a home health agency and help people, mostly elderly, in their homes with any health care needs they may have.

lender.name: Sunny
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are trying to better their families and have a hard time.
lender.occupational_info: I don't work anymore. I am a mother, grandmother and great-grandmother...that is work enough!

lender.name: ALAN
lender.loan_because: My heart breaks for these people. I have seen the poverty first hand in my 2 trips to Tamale Ghana Africa. Even though it's just a little, it could mean the diffence between just surviving or getting ahead
lender.occupational_info: I am an assembly manager that monitors daily activity. I manage over 400 people. We build F-150 truck frames for Ford Motor Company

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: My mother asked for this instead of a Christmas present for herself. It's a wonderful way to be able to give to people and see how they prosper into successful buisness owners.
lender.occupational_info: I work with 27 children for 7 hours a day on the basic fundamentals of education.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: Helping others should be required by everyone!
lender.occupational_info: I fill my time with friends and family who make me happy and laugh! Music and reading are also very important to me.

lender.name: Adan
lender.loan_because: "For of him unto whom much is given much is required."
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, majoring in Arabic-Middle Eastern Studies and minoring in International Development and Business.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I find pleasure in helping people!

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I care!

lender.name: Bert
lender.loan_because: I am loved.
lender.occupational_info: I work for NASA helping Astronaughts live in space.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of one person helping one other person to change the world.

lender.name: Ryan & Courtney
lender.loan_because: Because everyone who is willing to work to better their life, deserves a chance to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I fix air planes. And Courtney is a writer.

lender.name: Elianarus
lender.loan_because: We want to help provide people with the opportunity to improve their lives. We are so fortunate because of the opportunities that we've had. It is incumbent upon us to provide opportunities for others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a software engineer, my wife is a nurse practitioner, and my son is Batman.

lender.name: Gabe
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in other developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: i am a student. A cool student.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I can, and I should.

lender.name: DSayer
lender.loan_because: I am

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: helping others help themselves is always the right thing to do

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to children from other countries.

lender.name: Democratic Women
lender.occupation: Democratic Women of Mohave County, Az
lender.loan_because: We Care.

lender.name: Noella
lender.loan_because: i want to be a part of the solution.
lender.occupational_info: I work to sustain and expand free after-school programs for all NYC youth

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: I have more than I need and want to share what I have been blessed with.

lender.name: Erin & Seth
lender.loan_because: why not?
lender.occupational_info: I help people with their work visa's so that they can legally work in the US.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: The cost is low and the reward is high
lender.occupational_info: I help to develop new medicines

lender.name: Melissa & Hugo
lender.loan_because: Happiness isn't happiness unless it is shared!
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language to students from across the world.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I loan because I am fortunate enough to be able to do so at this time. I hope that, if I am ever in need one day, that someone will have it in their heart to help me.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a counseling service that assists people that have a problem with alcohol and/or drugs.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I think micro finance is one of the best opportunities to empower people to lift themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: David 23
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I help people make important decisions about their lives.

lender.name: Conrad & Monica
lender.loan_because: We can make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: It's one of many effective, direct responses to help alleviate poverty. Microfinance is more than just an economic movement, but a social one as well.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I feel a moral responsibility to.
lender.occupational_info: i study to become a doctor and help the impoverished.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe in people's potential to achieve amazing things when they have access to resources.
lender.occupational_info: I run a 25 internet company called PBworks. We help hundreds of thousands of groups work better together, including the staff at Kiva.

lender.name: Miriam
lender.loan_because: I used to be a wholesale crafts importer and I worked with many small home businesses. I know how hard people work to make a living for their families.

lender.name: Caesar
lender.loan_because: My wife and I want to raise our daughters with the understanding of how important helping others really is. This is a very small thing to do that makes a huge impact.

lender.name: tNb
lender.loan_because: I believe.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: Many people have helped me when I needed it, that helping others is just paying it back - or is it paying it forward?
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mother to a 4 yr. old girl. My husband and I got a late start on parenting, I was almost 43 when our daughter born. I had worked 27 years before that as a secretary, and was ready to stop working and be a mom.

lender.name: Resa & Craig
lender.loan_because: anyone can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Resa: First Grade teacher. Craig: Mechanic.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to help others out from under the burdens of life and lift their spirits.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of the house and the kids. Meals, laundry, shopping, cleaning and raising my kids.

lender.name: Summer and Heather
lender.loan_because: It takes each of us to make a difference for all of us.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an outpatient mental health clinic providing services to those in need. I have always had a passion to "fix" the world and in some small way, this is my chance.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: this is how we know what love is...

lender.name: Cristina
lender.loan_because: I want to help others fulfill their life dreams and it brings me joy.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an executive in a philanthropic organization concerned with improving the health of individuals, families and communities.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I want to help people succeed. This is a simple, effective way to add something to the world.
lender.occupational_info: I manage computer system implementations in the largest private health maintenance organization in the U.S.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: We have a responsibility to help each other whenever we can to make the world a better place.

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference in someone elses life.

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: more like how could you not loan?
lender.occupational_info: High School Student

lender.name: Jon & Diann
lender.occupational_info: I work on making solar energy more efficient, available to more people, and less expensive.

lender.name: Jack & Blair
lender.loan_because: Our uncle helps us understand the satisfaction of helping others.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Janis & Randy
lender.loan_because: I believe God calls each of us to be responsible stewards of our blessings.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for 25 years in a bank - in a loan department, like the Kiva lenders. Now I sew. I make a lot of purses, also some clothing, altar linens and other items for our church as well as a ministry that gifts these items to other churches.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: I loan because it's a good thing to do.

lender.name: Lorna A
lender.loan_because: I wish to help others as I have been helped in my life.

lender.name: Gayle
lender.occupation: on disability insurance unable to work

lender.name: Rick
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who really need help
lender.occupational_info: I call radio stations in Texas to convince them to play the songs of singers who hire me to do that.

lender.name: Shin
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves an opportunity to pursue their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I build and maintain City infrastructure

lender.name: Esteban
lender.loan_because: I'm a closet Marxist.
lender.occupational_info: I make films that make people laugh and believe in the magic of life.

lender.name: Joe and Karena
lender.loan_because: We want to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I believe there are many good and trusting people on our Earth.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: Eliminating poverty in the world is important to me. Connecting to others in this way is humbling and deeply satisfying. Making loans is right for the times. Look at the numbers. I think kiva.org is brilliant.
lender.occupational_info: I've owned a small business for over 20 years, based on a product we invented and patented.

lender.name: Glenda
lender.loan_because: I am amazed at how little it takes to make such an impact on other's lives.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I want to help others improve their position in life. When I have been given so much, I want to share it with others.
lender.occupational_info: I give people anesthesia for surgery, unconfortable proceedures and baby delivery in the United States.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: everyone should have a chance to make a living

lender.name: Tim and Julie
lender.loan_because: I work with incredible people in the Philippines every day, having the ability to provide a little bit of financing to those in need is a fantastic opportunity

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: for $25 which I won't miss, I can make a big difference in someone else's life :) and that's what it's all about!

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: God has given to me, so I pass it on, that they will someday know my joy of giving back.
lender.occupational_info: I have always been a servant/helper to anyone who passes through my life, whether it be helping young adults or my family & friends. My soul is joyful, even as age catches up with my body. 60 years old soon, I need to teach others to find this same happiness, by giving more. CBA

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: It is an opportunity to strengthen and support families all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I am working with kids 12 - 18 who are criminals and have been incarcerated. I have been going to school for 3 years at night while working full time and will become a teacher in May of 2008 at the age of 52.

lender.name: SEpps
lender.loan_because: I am blessed!

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I am lucky to be able to.

lender.name: Margo
lender.loan_because: I originally made a loan as a Christmas gift for my mom. Now I reloan the money because I believe that small changes can make huge differences.

lender.name: peter
lender.loan_because: Empowering others is an extraordinary gift to be able to give.
lender.occupational_info: Trial lawyer.

lender.name: bettyjane
lender.loan_because: to honor my grandparents who came to the US with nothing but hope and determination
lender.occupational_info: to practice law as a healer of conflict

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I relate to a creative and risk-taking willingness to explore personal potential, and I support because I can. Though I'm also a pragmatic that invests resources into well thought-out ventures. I find both aspects here.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I believe it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: No job is done until the paperwork is finished.
